title: 谷歌AI研究员潜入梵蒂冈游说教皇：AGI将带来世界末日
description: 当硅谷还在争论人工智能何时超越人类时，一群“末日信徒”已经把目光投向了世界上最古老的权力中心——梵蒂冈。
titleZh: 谷歌AI研究员潜入梵蒂冈游说教皇：AGI将带来世界末日
titleEn: Google AI Researcher Infiltrates Vatican to Lobby the Pope: AGI Will Bring Doomsday
descriptionZh: 当硅谷还在争论人工智能何时超越人类时，一群“末日信徒”已经把目光投向了世界上最古老的权力中心——梵蒂冈。
descriptionEn: While Silicon Valley is still debating when AI will surpass humans, a group of "doomsday believers" has already set their sights on the world's oldest center of power—the Vatican. Former Google researcher Levin attempted to give Pope Leo XIV a "red pill" before tech giants could "appease" the Church: the real Judgment Day might not be divine punishment, but runaway code. This is a game unfolding between faith and algorithms, with the fate of humanity in the AGI era at stake.

title: 罗永浩年底曝细红线AI软件；
description: 罗永浩今日在微博发长文，宣布“罗永浩的十字路口”年度科技创新分享会（2025）将于今年12月30日在上海举行。
titleZh: 罗永浩年底曝细红线AI软件；
titleEn: Luo Yonghao Exposes Thin Red Line AI Software at Year-End; Super Moon Returns on December 5th; Doubao AI Phone Launched at 3499 Yuan | Geek Headlines
descriptionZh: 罗永浩今日在微博发长文，宣布“罗永浩的十字路口”年度科技创新分享会（2025）将于今年12月30日在上海举行。
descriptionEn: Luo Yonghao posted a lengthy article on Weibo today, announcing that the "Crossroads of Luo Yonghao" Annual Technology Innovation Sharing Conference (2025) will be held in Shanghai on December 30th this year. On December 1st, news broke that ZTE's official website has now released the detailed specifications of the Nubia M153 Doubao Phone Assistant, which is equipped with the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Ultimate chip and a 6000mAh battery.
